properties.address: 28 Plough Hill, Caistor , Market Rasen LN76LZ
properties.description: Open to all. Caistor Community Library (Free Membership) has almost 4000 books, a puzzle library, computers, wifi and reading nooks. A cafe downstairs and art exhibitions.
properties.title: Caistor Arts & Heritage Centre

properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children including Connect Over A Cuppa community coffee morning every Friday 10am-12noon, there is no charge for refreshments.
properties.title: Louth Library
